name: geoserver-introduction-ws
description: The materials for the geoserver-introduction workshop

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run doc:build && npm run doc:pdf && npm run doc:epub && cd build/geoserver-introduction-ws
scripts.archive: npm run build && cd build && zip -x geoserver-introduction-ws/materials/* -r geoserver-introduction-ws.zip geoserver-introduction-ws geoserver-introduction-ws_*.pdf geoserver-introduction-ws_*.epub

author: terrestris GmbH & Co.KG
